section.p: The template captures the content of the Death Diagnosis Domain. It includes diagnostic information linked to the death of a study subject.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1003)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1004)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1005)
A sequence number for the observation. [SEND: DDSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1006)/@code="C95087" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1007)
A value to indicate the observation records diagnosis information assoicated with the subject's death. Note, the SEND instruction is for the value to always equal "death diagnosis". [SEND: DDTESTCD, DDTEST]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1008), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Death Diagnosis locally defined STATIC (CONF:1552)
The recorded death diagnosis. Use of the CD type allows the original text result to be captured within the original text property, while the code property recrods the standardized result. [SEND: DDORRES, DDSTRESC]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1010)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1011)
Information on whether a predefined data item was collected, and the timing of collection.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:1012)
Records the role of the person evaluating the finding.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Finding Evaluator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.84)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1013)
The record of a category to be used in organizing finding or observation results.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.76)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1014)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1015)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1016)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1003)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1004)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1005)
A sequence number for the observation. [SEND: DDSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1006)/@code="C95087" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1007)
A value to indicate the observation records diagnosis information assoicated with the subject's death. Note, the SEND instruction is for the value to always equal "death diagnosis". [SEND: DDTESTCD, DDTEST]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1008), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Death Diagnosis locally defined STATIC (CONF:1552)
The recorded death diagnosis. Use of the CD type allows the original text result to be captured within the original text property, while the code property recrods the standardized result. [SEND: DDORRES, DDSTRESC]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1010)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1011)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)
Information on whether a predefined data item was collected, and the timing of collection.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:1012)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Finding Evaluator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.84)
Records the role of the person evaluating the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1013)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.76)
The record of a category to be used in organizing finding or observation results.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1014)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1015)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1016)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

<code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="714844756"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
